item.angelring.angel_ring.not_enough_xp: You need to have XP to fly. Get more XP to fly again.
item.angelring.angel_ring.desc0: Angel Ring drains player's XP over time while flying.
item.angelring.angel_ring.desc1: If player's XP reaches less than 1 level,
item.angelring.angel_ring.desc2: magic will disappear and flight will not be possible.
item.angelring.angel_ring.classic.desc0: Angel Ring is switched into Classic Mode. Grants creative flight while in Curios slot.
item.angelring.angel_ring.classic.desc1: Switch XP draining to more than 0 points in the config to switch to Rebalanced Mode.
item.angelring.energetic_angel_ring.not_: You need more FE to fly. Charge your Angel Ring to fly again.
item.angelring.energetic_angel_ring.desc: Angel Ring drains the stored FE over time while flying.
Angel Ring currently contains %s FE / %s FE.
angelring.warning: §cYour Angel Ring is running low on power!
